name: Endless halo
description:
This is a quick reaction training game.

As a special forces soldier, you are about to participate in the battle.

Before the battle, the leader decided to conduct the final real test on you!

When you open your eyes, pick up the weapons around you.

And charge forward!

Please note that you are on the way to charge. Bullets will shoot at you!

Gameplay

Mobile=WASD
